brief.content-text: The diagram depicts the seven layers of the O S I model and associates WAN services with the Data Link Layer 2 and Physical Layer 1. Frame Relay, ATM, and High-Level Data Link Control (HDLC) WAN services operate at Layer 2. The Physical Layer (O S I Layer 1) protocols describe how to provide electrical, mechanical, operational, and functional connections to the services of a communications service provider.
